recipe.title: Ipanema Punch
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the Cointreau, rum, crème de banane, grapefruit juice, orange juice, lime juice, and pineapple juice. Cover and chill for at least 1 hour or overnight.
Pour the mixture into a punch bowl or large pitcher. Add the frozen berries (as "ice cubes").
Top with ginger ale and stir gently to blend. Garnish each glass.
